DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this study is to compare the effects on attention and memory functioning to participating in an aerobic and dance exercise called Zumba to educational program on exercise that encourages regular stretching and walking.
DOC.brief_title: Does Zumba Improve Cognition in Healthy APOE e4 Carriers and Noncarriers
DOC.criteria: Healthy women between the ages of 5580 without cognitive complaints History of significant health conditions
